page.title: 15LOCAL PUBLICATIONS
page.content: {The Falmouth Packet This local weekly newspaper was established in 1855 and takes its name from the packet ships which operated from the port.Every Friday it carries a variety of local news stories, a letters page, advertising and sports columns, together with T.V. viewing. A special feature is the Pendennis Column, noting events of 25, 50 and 100 years ago. {The West Briton This is a weekly newspaper covering a wider area with a larger readership. While covering all local news it also has special motor mart and property sections. {The Leader This is a weekly free newspaper which deals mainly with advertising, though it has a doctor's column and gardening page.
